definitions.definition: not moving; not intended to be moved

examples.text: The car collided with a stationary vehicle.
I walked down one of the stationary escalators.
Some of the larger birds can remain stationary in the air for several minutes.

definitions.definition: not changing in condition or quantity

wordOrigin: late Middle English: from Latin stationarius (originally in the sense ‘belonging to a military station’), from statio(n-) ‘standing’, from stare ‘to stand’.
